scripts.maketaxidriver: cp navigation/Screensdriver.js navigation/Screens.js && npm run noregister
scripts.makechat: cp navigation/Screenschat.js navigation/Screens.js && npm run noregister
scripts.dev: cp config_dev.js config.js && cp navigation/Screensclient.js navigation/Screens.js
scripts.zipclient: npm run prepareforrelase && npm run makeclient && zip -r /Users/danieldimov/OneDrive/Plugins/MobileApps/FoodTigerClientApp/client_app.zip ./ -x "node_modules/*"  -x ".scripts/*"  -x "*.git*" -x "*.DS_Store"  -x "ios/Pods/*" -x "android/app/build/*"   -x "navigation/DriverStacks/*"  -x "navigation/VendorStacks/*"   -x "navigation/Screensclient.js"  -x "navigation/Screensdriver.js" -x "navigation/Screensvendor.js"  -x "navigation/ClientStacks/*"  -x "navigation/VendorStacks/*"   -x "navigation/Screensclient.js"  -x "navigation/Screensdriver.js" -x "navigation/Screensvendor.js" -x "navigation/Screenschat.js" -x "config_dev.js" -x "config_release.js" -x "1_docs/update_code_driver.txt" -x "1_docs/update_code_vendor.txt"  -x "1_docs/update_code_taxidriver.txt" && npm run dev
scripts.zipdriver: npm run prepareforrelase && npm run makedriver && zip -r /Users/danieldimov/OneDrive/Plugins/MobileApps/FoodTigerDriverApp/driver_app.zip ./ -x "node_modules/*"  -x ".scripts/*"  -x "*.git*" -x "*.DS_Store"  -x "ios/Pods/*" -x "android/app/build/*"   -x "navigation/ClientStacks/*"  -x "navigation/VendorStacks/*"   -x "navigation/Screensclient.js"  -x "navigation/Screensdriver.js" -x "navigation/Screensvendor.js"  -x "navigation/ClientStacks/*"  -x "navigation/VendorStacks/*"   -x "navigation/Screensclient.js"  -x "navigation/Screensdriver.js" -x "navigation/Screensvendor.js" -x "navigation/Screenschat.js" -x "config_dev.js" -x "config_release.js"  -x "1_docs/update_code_client.txt" -x "1_docs/update_code_vendor.txt" -x "1_docs/update_code_taxidriver.txt"  && npm run dev
scripts.ziptaxidriver: npm run prepareforrelase && npm run maketaxidriver && zip -r /Users/danieldimov/OneDrive/Plugins/MobileApps/TaxiDriver/taxi_driver_app.zip ./ -x "node_modules/*"  -x ".scripts/*"  -x "*.git*" -x "*.DS_Store"  -x "ios/Pods/*" -x "android/app/build/*"   -x "navigation/ClientStacks/*"  -x "navigation/VendorStacks/*"   -x "navigation/Screensclient.js"  -x "navigation/Screensdriver.js" -x "navigation/Screensvendor.js"  -x "navigation/ClientStacks/*"  -x "navigation/VendorStacks/*"   -x "navigation/Screensclient.js"  -x "navigation/Screensdriver.js" -x "navigation/Screensvendor.js" -x "navigation/Screenschat.js" -x "config_dev.js" -x "config_release.js"  -x "1_docs/update_code_driver.txt" -x "1_docs/update_code_client.txt"  -x "1_docs/update_code_vendor.txt"  && npm run dev
